Dialogue.Page: You there, you're here just in time!
Help us move, we're getting off of this stinking rock!

DialogueOption.Text: I'm busy right now, I have an important mission.

Dialogue.Page: It's hot, the air stinks, these constant flashes of light hurt my eyes, we have to eat algae, and THE WEST SETTLEMENT BURNED TO THE GROUND!
I cannot stand another day here, in fact it might actually kill me, kill us all! Me and Stoneroller are leaving!
Now, are you going to help us?
Too busy to help an old fellow and their child?
No no, I get it, just go get Minnow for me.
